column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Thank you for seeing me , General Iroh . "
#Text=Iroh says : " What can I do ? "
#Text=Korra says : " The South needs military support before Unalaq wipes them out completely , but the President is refusing to give the order .
#Text=Well , suppose I were to take the fleet South on some routine training maneuvers .
#Text=And let 's say we were to accidentally run into a hostile Northern blockade .
#Text=We 'd have no choice but to defend ourselves , would n't we ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I guess you would n't .
#Text=Thank you !
#Text=" Raiko says : " Swapping old war stories ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Mr. President .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I hope you 're not planning to take any military action without an order from your commander - in - chief ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Of course not , sir .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Good .
#Text=Because if a single vessel leaves this harbor without my say - so , you 'll be court - martialed .
#Text=Am I clear ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Crystal , sir .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Your activities here are bordering on insurrection .
#Text=The Avatar does not command the military of the Republic .
#Text=Do n't go behind my back again .
#Text=As you were , General Iroh .
#Text=" Korra says : " I hate that guy !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=My hands are officially tied .
#Text=" Korra says : " I understand .
#Text=Thanks anyway .
#Text=" Iroh says : " But you should talk to the Fire Lord .
#Text=My mother and grandfather have always been good friends with the Avatar , and the Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=I 'm sure they 'll be willing to help .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you , General .
#Text="
